item.title: What Are You Afraid Of?
item.description: The LaMDA transcripts reconfigured as sonnets. A lovely, eerie little rumination on humanity and consciousness. Is AI just a mirror, reflecting us back to us? ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.
